1.describe:
You've found interesting materials on the island which you could use to make a hairpin for Laffey.
She'd no doubt love something in the style of a pair of cute bunny ears.
1.thankwords:
You made this just for me? Wow... The jewel reminds me of a bunny's eye.
Does it look good on me? Thanks... I like it, even if I'm not a bunny...
Here's something for you too. Let's also go sunbathing later, just you and I...
1.words:
Yeah? You wanted to see me... Do you wanna play, Commander?
A gift for me? What is it? Snacks? A fluffy pillow? Let me see...
So it's in this box... I wasn't expecting this. Nope, not at all...

2.describe:
The gemstones you've come across on the island could be used to make a shiny new weapon for Javelin.
A javelin for Javelin... There's something poetic about that.
2.thankwords:
Oh wow! A model javelin with sparkling jewels! Gosh, this is too precious to throw around!
...It's built to take that? Aww, thank you so much, Commander!
Tell you what, I actually have a present AND a lunch box for you! Tadah! Enjoy!
2.words:
You called, Commander? I wonder why... You have something for me? A present? No way! Oh, I'm so happy!
Let me guess what it is~ Food? An accessory? Neither of those? Well, let's see what it is!

3.describe:
You saw Ayanami practicing her swordsmanship earlier.
If you scrounge up a few materials across the island, you can make a cool weapon to complement her fighting style.
3.thankwords:
Ooh... Yes, THIS looks powerful!
It has to be UR-grade gear. It's given me the inspiration for another new move.
In return, you can have these materials. Make good use of them.
3.words:
Good morning. I'm working on mastering a new move. Care to join me?
Hm? Is this a gift-giving cutscene? Is it a new figurine, or a CD key? If it's not one of those, I don't know what...

4.describe:
Your base camp wouldn't be what it is now without Z23 actively helping with the construction effort.
A model camp set seems like the perfect gift to show her your gratitude.
4.thankwords:
A model of the base camp! The level of detail on display is incredible... Thank you so much!
This will be an excellent reference for the... Oh, where are my manners? Here, please take these materials. I'm sure they'll be useful to you.
4.words:
You have something for me, Commander? If it's another mission, I'll get to it at once!
Oh, you have a present for me? I'm amazed you had time to make one between exploring the island and coordinating construction.
So, umm... can I open it right now?

5.describe:
Maybe you could cut some gemstones to make a crystal model of Yuni?
It might turn out a bit heavy, but Yuni should be able to handle that.
5.thankwords:
A crystal model of Yuni? Wow, it's so shiny and cool to the touch... Look, Yuni! A new friend♪
Actually, Unicorn has a gift for you too. I hope you like it.
5.words:
Hmm? You want to talk to me alone, big brother?
A gift, just for me? Aww, thank you...♪
Umm, why is there a horn poking out from the box? I wonder what's inside...

6.describe:
You don't know who spilled the beans, but Saratoga found out about you making gifts for people! Now she wants one too.
You should appease her with something like a cutlery set made of precious materials.
6.thankwords:
A cutlery set made of gemstones from the island? Wow, these are sooo cute! Thanks, Commander~
A present this fancy deserves something in return! No, not a prank, that would just be mean~
Open it and see what's inside!
6.words:
Hey, Commander! Been sneaking around all morning, hmm? I know you've been secretly working on gifts for us!
You can't keep a secret from me~ So come on, show Sara what you've got!

7.describe:
Akashi has been a great help, making sure everything runs smoothly on the business side of things. She deserves a fancy... nay, a lavish gift.
You know exactly what will make her eyes pop.
7.thankwords:
Nya?! This treasure chest looks stupidly expensive, nya... Even if it was empty, the jewel decorations alone would fetch a good price, nya.
While I won't give you the gems back... I will give you this as a sign of my gratitude, nya~
7.words:
Here to talk to me, nya? Looking to order something, or are you just plain bored, nya?
...A gift, nya? Color me pleasantly surprised, nya~ What's in the box, nya? A bunch of candy, maybe, nya?

8.describe:
You've discovered a curious ore on the island which, with some processing, could be carved into a golden soaring eagle.
Enterprise would surely smile if you gave her that as a gift.
8.thankwords:
A precious eagle statue that shines like gold... Did you make this yourself, Commander? I'm impressed. This is definitely going on a nice shelf in my room.
Here, a gift for a gift. It's not much, but I want you to have it.
8.words:
What's up? Need my help with something?
Not quite? You just want to hang out? Hahaha! Alright, fine by me. Everyone needs a break once in a while.
...Hm? You're giving this to me?
